thread.title: Comcast agrees to pay $33M in California privacy breach
thread.title_full: Comcast agrees to pay $33M in California privacy breach - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Comcast agrees to pay $33M in California privacy breach
text: LOS ANGELES (AP) — Cable operator Comcast has settled with California authorities and agreed to pay $33 million for accidentally publishing the names, phone numbers and addresses of about 75,000 people who paid to keep the information private. About $432,000 more will go to about 200 law enforcement officers, judges and domestic abuse victims who said they faced safety concerns because of the leak, which occurred from 2010 to 2012. »
